section.name: Schemes
section.p: Using jLBC some cryptosystems has been implemented. Into the jLBC distribution package you will find the full implementation of these cryptosystems in the context of the Bouncy Castle framework. This will simplify the integration into the Java Cryptography Extension (JCE) framework.
The followings links will point you to some web-pages which describe the implemented cryptosystems in a simplified way to give you some hits on how to do crypto-stuff by using jLBC.
